message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. Considering its value to me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $10,000 is below my minimum.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I still believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,500.
